sentences.sContent: Next month, biologists should know how many females are pregnant and how many crossbred babies will be born this year.
sentences.sContent_eng: Next month, biologists should know how many females are pregnant and how many crossbred babies will be born this year.
sentences.sCn: 下个月，生物学家就将得知，该计划中有多少雌性侏儒兔已经怀孕以及今年将诞生多少杂交的兔宝宝。

sentences.sContent: At some point, early colonists crossbred smaller European-bred stock with American wild turkeys to produce hearty but tame breeds such as the Standard Bronze.
sentences.sContent_eng: At some point, early colonists crossbred smaller European-bred stock with American wild turkeys to produce hearty but tame breeds such as the Standard Bronze.
sentences.sCn: 从某个时候开始，早期的殖民者将欧洲饲养的体型较小的火鸡与美国野火鸡杂交，从而培育出了标准青铜色火鸡这样健硕而温驯的火鸡品种。

sentences.sContent: Grass of crossbred color page is vivacious herb, its alias has multicoloured revive, foreign purple perilla.
sentences.sContent_eng: Grass of crossbred color page is vivacious herb, its alias has multicoloured revive, foreign purple perilla.
sentences.sCn: 杂种彩叶草为多年生草本植物，其别名有五彩苏、洋紫苏等。

words.tran: 交叉，十字；十字架，十字形物
十字路口；杂交；横渡；横道

trans.tranOther: (of plants or animals) produced as a result of crossbreeding
a crossbred plant or animal, esp an animal resulting from a cross between two pure breeds

trans.tranCn: 杂交繁育（crossbreed的过去式和过去分词）
